tree.speaker: Frog King
tree.text: We detect a presence. A Lucosa.

dialogue.speaker: Frog King
dialogue.text: What is your business here, Lucosa?

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: (They might be helping the hunters, I should be careful with my words.)

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: I'm part of the search group for that shapeshifter. I'm sure you've heard about them by now.

path.speaker: Frog King
path.text: Fool! We own these lands, not you. I suggest you leave now.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: (I should just sidestep the shapeshifter thing entirely, best not to tempt fate.)

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: I'm just here to see the waterfall, like anyone else.

path.speaker: Frog King
path.text: Understandable. If you keep peace, our lands are yours.

path.speaker: Frog King
path.text: Be careful while you climb. Our guards are on edge for Lucosa today.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: (The frogs have no reason to turn me in. I can just be honest.)

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: ...If I may be honest, I'm hiding. The Lucosan Royal Guard put a bounty on my head for, uh, reasons.

path.speaker: Frog King
path.text: I see. May I give advice?

path.speaker: Frog King
path.text: Leave, if you can. The Lucosa have no power to arrest you here. Keep out of trouble, and I will stop them.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: (It seems like he's actually on my side! It feels nice, having an ally...)
